pages.text: A few changes are made to Pistons in the $(thing)Crucial$() modpack.$(li)Pistons may push up to 24 blocks, rather than 12.$(li)Pistons can push blocks with more complex contents, such as Chests or Hoppers.$(li)Non-sticky Pistons can push dropped items further, they just launch them!$(li)Sticky Pistons can pull dropped items into them, provided they're adjacent.

Additionally, while not directly relating to Pistons, items will bounce off Slime Blocks just as much as normal living things do.$(br2)You can combine this with Pistons' new ability to push items for some fun devices.
